participant_1.background:
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
i am 29 years old.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.

participant_2.background:
I drink milk to help me digest my large meals.
I enjoy the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
I've learned to forgive myself for the mistakes I've made in the past.
I would brag about my ability to find peace and tranquility in nature.
my father died when i was 2.

content.text: What's your favorite way to relax?
Hi! I like to go to the park and read or take my sketchbook.
That sounds lovely. I love the park too. I usually take my laptop to work on lessons while I'm there.
I'm a kindergarten teacher. I love my job!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've learned to forgive myself for the mistakes I've made in the past.
That's great! I'm still working on that one.
It's hard, but it's worth it. I think the best way to forgive yourself is to learn from your mistakes and move on.
That's a good point. I'll have to remember that.
I would brag about my ability to find peace and tranquility in nature.
That's really nice. I wish I could do that. I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, but I'm still pretty stressed out from school.
It takes practice, but it's worth it. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat. Her name is Mittens. She's a great stress reliever.
Aww, I love cats. They're so cute.
